settings.about_content__body: We are a combination of; Engineers, Designers, Marketers, and Visionaries who share a common goal; to find easy solutions to reduce our waste consumption while having fun in the process.
settings.about_content__2018text: Soapstand starts as a company. We are recognized by the National Zero Waste council as one of the three Top Innovations in Canada.
settings.about_content__2019text: Launched Drinkfill beverage concept to eliminate single use beverage containers.
settings.about_contact__title: find out what's next with us !!
